provisions.title: Section 8
provisions.content:
8.   An employer shall not cause or permit a
                                worker to work, and a worker shall not work,
                                on specified operations for more than­
                                     (a)   twelve hours on any day;
                                     (b)   forty hours in any period 0 f seven
                                           consecutive days; or
                                     (c)   one hundred and twenty hours in
                                           any    period    of     twenty-one
                                           consecutive days.".
